title: Hyatt strengthens leadership in India and Southwest Asia region
description: Hyatt Hotels Corporation has expanded its senior leadership team in India and Southwest Asia, announcing Deepa Krishnan as head of marketing and Prasad Narulkar as director of digital. Krishnan will lead strategic marketing initiatives and brand development for Hyatt's portfolio in the region, having worked at companies like Tata Starbucks, Diageo, Godrej, and Idea Cellular.
